DOC.brief_title: Outcomes Antipsychotic Medication Used Emergency Department
DOC.detailed_description: A retrospective chart review perform patient present ED agitation subsequently give antipsychotic therapy treatment . Identification patient chart review patient present agitation . Data record include patient age , gender , medical history , time presentation , time treatment , co morbidity , use restraint , time disposition patient outcome . Inclusion criterion include patient age 18 present ED agitation treat antipsychotic . No patient knowingly exclude analysis . We compare result outcome patient treated agitation see Adasuve superior commonly prescribed antipsychotic rate discharge home overall time emergency department .
DOC.criteria: All patient give antipsychotic therapy acute agitation
